name: Guessing Game
description: Created variables, took user input, created conditional statements, created a main game loop, and created functions in order to produce a console based guessing game. This game takes input from one user in the form of an integer. Another player then attempts to guess the first player’s input. The program reports back if the second player’s guess was too high, too low, or incorrect. The second player is limited to 5 tries and can choose to restart or quit the program.
